The comparison of images featuring Sania: with one image showing her in modern clothing and the other in a hijab, suggesting a contrast between how she dresses in India and Pakistan.
The use of a text blurb accompanying the: stating that those who feel fearful about living in India should see Sania Mirza and contemplate, implying that her choice of clothing in Pakistan is related to fear.

The verification process conducted by Al: which included using Google reverse image search to find the original source of the image of Sania Mirza in a hijab, as well as researching articles and photographs of her visits to Saudi Arabia and Pakistan to determine the authenticity of the claim.
